required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: AM-101 in the Treatment of Post-Acute Tinnitus 1
clinical_study.official_title: AM-101 in the Post-Acute Treatment of Peripheral Tinnitus 1 (AMPACT1) - an Open-Label Extension to the TACTT2 Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research study is to test the safety and local tolerance of repeated treatment cycles of AM-101.

detailed_description.textblock: This open-label extension study is assessing the safety and local tolerance of repeated treatment cycles of AM-101 in subjects previously treated in the scope of the TACTT2 study (NCT01803646).

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 35 (Air Conduction)
primary_outcome.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 119 (Air Conduction)
primary_outcome.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 203 (Air Conduction)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 168 (TV7) up to Day 203 (FUV8) of cycle 3
primary_outcome.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: A total of 260 subjects were enrolled and 257 subjects were treated in overall 59 active sites in Canada (6), the United States (35), the Czech Republic (7), Israel (2), Turkey (3) and Republic of South Korea (6). Subjects could only participate if they had been previously enrolled and completed the participation in the TACTT2 study.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Main Inclusion Criteria: completion of TACTT2 study negative pregnancy test (women of childbearing potential) willing and able to attend the study visits during at least one treatment cycle.

group.title: 1 Cycle AM-101
group.description: Subjects participated in 1 treatment cycle and received one round of 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0-D4)

group.title: 2 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in 2 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0 - D4) in cycle 1 and after final follow-up (D84) of cycle 1, they rolled-over to treatment cycle 2 receiving once more 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D84 - D88).

group.title: 3 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in all 3 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 x 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days. The subjects could only roll-over if they completed the final follow-up of the previous cycle and were still eligible. In cycle 1 treatment was within D0 - D4. Cycle 2 treatment within D84 - D88. And treatment for cycle 3 within D168-D172. Final follow-up after 3 treatment cycles was FUV9 (D252).

group.title: 1 Cycle AM-101
group.description: Subjects participated in 1 treatment cycle and received one round of 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0-D4)

group.title: 2 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in 2 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0 - D4) in cycle 1 and after final follow-up (D84) of cycle 1, they rolled-over to treatment cycle 2 receiving once more 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D84 - D88).

group.title: 3 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in all 3 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 x 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days. The subjects could only roll-over if they completed the final follow-up of the previous cycle and were still eligible. In cycle 1 treatment was within D0 - D4. Cycle 2 treatment within D84 - D88. And treatment for cycle 3 within D168-D172. Final follow-up after 3 treatment cycles was FUV9 (D252).

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 35 (Air Conduction)
outcome.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.
outcome.population: The safety analysis set includes all subjects that had at least one intratympanic injection. Subjects are only considered at a time point if the hearing threshold is available.

group.title: 1 Cycle AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated only in 1 treatment cycle. This endpoint counts existing deteriorations at FUV2.

group.title: 2 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in 2 treatment cycles. This endpoint lists deteriorations at FUV2.

group.title: 3 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in 3 treatment cycles. This endpoint lists deteriorations at FUV2.

measure.title: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 35 (Air Conduction)
measure.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.
measure.population: The safety analysis set includes all subjects that had at least one intratympanic injection. Subjects are only considered at a time point if the hearing threshold is available.

analysis.groups_desc: Fisher's exact test to assess if there is a difference in deterioration of hearing threshold between subjects that received 1 treatment cycle with AM-101 or others who received 2 treatment cycles.
Fisher's exact test to assess if there is a difference in deterioration of hearing threshold between subjects that received 1 treatment cycle with AM-101 or others who received 3 treatment cycles.
Fisher's exact test to assess if there is a difference in deterioration of hearing threshold between subjects that received 2 treatment cycles with AM-101 or others who received 3 treatment cycles.

outcome.title: Frequency of Subjects With a Deterioration of Hearing Threshold at Day 119 (Air Conduction)
outcome.description: Valid for Safety Analysis Set was used. Air conduction: The atmospheric transmission of sound to the inner ear through the external auditory canal and via structures of the middle ear. The ability of hearing is measured in decibel (dB). The hearing threshold, is the lowest sound pressure where the ear can perceive still a sound. The endpoint deterioration of hearing threshold ≥15 dB in two contiguous test frequencies means that hearing worsens ≥15 dB in two neighboring sound frequencies.
outcome.population: The safety analysis set includes all subjects that had at least one intratympanic injection. Subjects are only considered at a time point if the hearing threshold is available. Subjects from Cycle 1 did not participate in Cycle 2 and 3 and are therefore "zero".

group.description: Subjects that participated in 2 treatment cycles. This endpoint lists deteriorations at FUV5.

group.description: Subjects that participated in 3 treatment cycles. This endpoint lists deteriorations at FUV5.

reported_events.time_frame: From baseline to end of study at all visits, up to Day 252.
reported_events.desc: Assessed by Investigator at all visits. In non-serious adverse events section, under occurrences (all), reported numbers are "subjects affected".

group.title: 1 Cycle AM-101
group.description: Subjects participated in 1 treatment cycle and received one round of 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0-D4)

group.title: 2 Cycles AM-101
group.description: Subjects that participated in 2 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D0 - D4) in cycle 1 and after final follow-up (D84) of cycle 1, they rolled-over to treatment cycle 2 receiving once more 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days (D84 - D88).

group.description: Subjects that participated in all 3 treatment cycles of the AMPACT1 study, received 3 x 3 repeated doses of AM-101 gel (0.87 mg/mL) within 5 days. The subjects could only roll-over if they completed the final follow-up of the previous cycle and were still eligible. In cycle 1 treatment was within D0 - D4. Cycle 2 treatment within D84 - D88. And treatment for cycle 3 within D168-D172. Final follow-up after 3 treatment cycles was FUV9 (D252).

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Investigator agrees to submit a copy of any intended communication, presentation or publication (abstract, poster, article, etc.) (all together “Communication”) at least 2 month in advance of the submission of proposed Communication. The Sponsor shall have 60 days, after receipt of said copies, to object to such proposed Communication. In case of such objection, the Investigator shall refrain from making such Communication for 6 months from date of receipt of such objection.
